https://tmrev.io/movie/869250-Being James Bond 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jLaAbwPDzHNbJfZ0Xj0CkeM56CO.jpg Daniel Craig candidly reflects on his 15 year adventure as James Bond. Including never-before-seen archival footage from Casino Royale to the upcoming 25th film No Time To Die, Craig shares his personal memories in conversation with 007 producers, Michael G Wilson and Barbara Broccoli. Being James Bond
